import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useStore } from './dummy' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Description = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [cart, setCart] = useState() const currentBrand = useStore((state:any) => state.currentBrand) const currentImage = useStore((state:any) => state.currentImage) const currentPhone = useStore((state:any) => state.currentPhone) const currentPrice = useStore((state:any) => state.currentPrice) const currentOS = useStore((state:any) => state.currentOS) return (

{currentBrand}

{currentPhone}



OS: {currentOS}



Price: {currentPrice}


{cart}

Do You have a phone to trade in

How the trade-in process works

) } export default Description
